answers.answer: Hello Noor,welcome.  The most important thing for your mother to do now is to get excellent control of her blood sugar.  This will prevent (can heal) neuropathy if she has it and also help with circulation.To control blood sugars she should work with her doctor for meds (what meds is she on?), eat low carbohydrate diet, and take up daily exercise of at least 30 minutes (more if she can).We can recommend some good books if these would be of use.  There is alos plenty of online information about lower carb diets for diabetes management.hope your mother feels better soon.

Hi Noor,Following are the books:-1. Diabetes Solutions by Dr. Richard Bernstein (this one recommends very low carb but gives excellent info and tools for management), it is quite complex though.2. Think Like a Pancreas by Gary Scheiner3. Using Insulin by John WalshAll are available on amazon.
